protein.specific_function: This enzyme scavenge exogenous and endogenous cytidine and 2'-deoxycytidine for UMP synthesis.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds
hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds, in cyclic amidines
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process
cellular response to external biotic stimulus
negative regulation of nucleotide metabolic process
